citations.narrative:
The licensee is not using the APHIS Form 7005 for acquisition/inventory of the dogs on hand and has not applied for a
variance. The licensee is currently using paper and computer records. Each dealer shall use Record of Acquisition and
Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS 7005) to make, keep, and maintain the information required for proper identification of
the regulated animals. Complete records of animals facilitate the inspection process and enable the movement and care
of animals covered by the Animal Welfare Act to be evaluated. The facility must ensure all required information is properly
and accurately documented at all times by either using the APHIS Form 7005 or applying for a variance.
To be corrected by: 5/15/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee is not using the APHIS Form 7005 for acquisition/inventory of the dogs on hand and has not applied for a 
variance. The licensee is currently using paper and computer records. Each dealer shall use Record of Acquisition and 
Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS 7005) to make, keep, and maintain the information required for proper identification of 
the regulated animals. Complete records of animals facilitate the inspection process and enable the movement and care 
of animals covered by the Animal Welfare Act to be evaluated. The facility must ensure all required information is properly 
and accurately documented at all times by either using the APHIS Form 7005 or applying for a variance.  
To be corrected by: 5/15/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
